meanings.definition: A person in charge of a ship.
meanings.sent1: The shipmasters guided the vessel safely through the storm.
meanings.sent2: The shipmasters were experienced sailors who knew the seas well.
meanings.sent3: The shipmasters decided to have a race to see who could sail the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of shipping, the shipmasters are the ultimate decision-makers.
meanings.sent5: The shipmasters' expertise was evident as they navigated the treacherous waters.

meanings.sent1: We met a group of shipmasters at the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The shipmasters gathered to discuss the upcoming voyage.
meanings.sent3: The shipmasters formed a band and played sea shanties for the crew.
meanings.sent4: The shipmasters stood proudly on the deck, overseeing the loading of cargo.
meanings.sent5: The shipmasters' uniforms identified them as leaders of the fleet.
